about.title: About Me
about.description: Hi there! I'm Olga, a passionate Frontend Engineer based in Sydney. I specialize in creating beautiful, responsive web applications using React and Vue.js. With a keen eye for design and a love for clean code, I bring ideas to life through modern web technologies. When I'm not coding, you'll find me exploring Sydney's amazing coffee scene or diving into the latest frontend trends.

playlistCoverGenerator.title: Playlist Cover AI Generator
playlistCoverGenerator.description: A web application that generates unique cover art for Spotify playlists using AI. Create stunning, personalized playlist covers with just a few clicks!

queenSelectShop.title: Queen Select Shop
queenSelectShop.description: A modern e-commerce platform built with React and TypeScript, featuring Redux for state management and Stripe integration for secure payments.

sweetTraveling.title: Sweet Traveling
sweetTraveling.description: A beautiful travel website showcasing destinations with smooth animations and modern design using advanced SCSS techniques.

monsterChatroom.title: Monster Chatroom
monsterChatroom.description: A real-time chat application built with React and Socket.io, featuring AI-powered chatbots and modern messaging interface.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together on your next project
